attributes.action: UK Government to require all animals to be effectively stunned before slaughter.
attributes.additional_details:
Non stun is not compassionate, is not justifiable and is increasing rather than decreasing. Some 60,000 sheep were killed in 2018 without any pre - stunning. 
https://www.kinderworld.org/videos/meat-industry/halal-slaughter/
https://www.rspca.org.uk/getinvolved/campaign/slaughter/england
attributes.background:
We, together with the RSPCA and the British Veterinary Association call for an immediate ban to non -stun Slaughter as per the RSPCA 
 and BVA letter  to the Defra Minister, George Eustice MP calling for urgent action to end non-stun slaughter in England.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300257.
